remarks: Version of ~ bj-ceqsalt with a dv condition on ` x , V ` , removing dependency on ~ df-sb and ~ df-clab .  Prefer its use over ~ bj-ceqsalt when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-ceqsaltv $p |- ( ( F/ x ps /\ A. x ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) /\ A e. V ) -> ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
